VirtualBox Notes - Tips & Tricks

  1. Send control alt delete to a Guest
    vboxmanage controlvm kaps-win7-vm01 keyboardputscancode 1d 38 53 9d b8 d8

    In this case the VM's name is “kaps-win7-vm01”

  2. Create a route so that an external command can enter and get to the guest
    VBoxManage setextradata kaps-sol-01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/ssh/HostPort" 2222
VBoxManage setextradata kaps-sol-01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/ssh/GuestPort" 22
VBoxManage setextradata kaps-sol-01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/ssh/Protocol" TCP

    Now if you ssh to the host machine on port “2222”, VirtualBox routes it to the guest's port 22. In this example the guest's name is kaps-sol-01 You have to power off and power on the Guest for this to take effect.
